item.title: pwning linux with... "QEMU"??
item.description: This post is about exploiting IOPL privilege escalation using QEMU’s Firmware Configuration (fw_cfg) device.

item.title: fetipop
item.description: novel technique I found in the linux kernel useful to exploit restricted dirty pagetable scenarios in a completely reliable and leakless way, through a new kind of “Oriented Programming”.
